verses.text: Lajan in icha junok anh xumac t'a sch'olanil yic Sarón, icha anh chochol sq'uib' t'a ak'lic, xchi ix. Syalan vinh quelem:
D'a skal eb' ix yetixal ix xajanab'il vuuj, lajan ix icha junok anh xumac t'a skal te' q'uiix, xchi vinh. Syalan ix cob'es:
D'a skal eb' yetquelemal vinh xajanab'il vuuj, lajan vinh icha junok te' mansan ay t'a caltac te'. Manh jantacoc swach'il vem k'ojan t'a yenhul, te chi' sat te' svab'i.
Ix in yik'b'at vinh t'a spatil nivac vael, t'a smasanil sk'ol vinh ix sch'oxo' to xajan in yuj.
Ak' te' taquinh sat uva t'ayin yic tz'och vip, a val te' mansan tzak' in lo yic sicb'i in k'ool, yujto tzin cham ach in nib'ani.
Ha sk'ab' vinh t'a sq'uexanh syak'och t'a yalanh in jolom, haxo swach' vinh tzin lak'anq'uei, xchi ix. Syalan vinh quelem:
Ex cob'estac aj Jerusalén, tzin tevi val t'ayex to manh e pitzel svayanh ix xajanab'il vuuj, munil ol el svayanh ix, xchi vinh. Syalan ix cob'es:
A... van sjavi vinh xajanab'il vuuj. Tzaxo vab' yoch sjaj vinh. Sq'ue val chennaj vinh scot t'a jolomtac vitz. Sq'ue val chennaj vinh sjavi t'a tzalquixtac.
Ha vinh xajanab'il vuuj, lajan vinh icha nok' ch'ucul, icha val junok yune' ch'ucul chi'. Ayxoek' vinh t'a patic pat tik, t'anhanxooch vinh t'a yolanil ventena.
Ha vinh xajanab'il vuuj chi', ix yal vinh t'ayin icha tik: Q'ueanh vaan ach xajanab'il vuuj, cotanh ach nib'ab'il vuuj.
Inai, toxo ix ek'b'at sk'ual sicnhab'.
Ayxo anh xumac t'a caltac te', toxo ix k'och stiempoal yoch b'it, tzaxo cab' yoch sjaj nok' cuvajte' t'a tik.
Ayxo sat te' higo, sumumi yel sjab' te' uva. Q'ueanh vaan ach xajanab'il vuuj, ach to te wach' ilji, cotanh, xchi vinh t'ayin, xchi ix. Syalan vinh quelem:
Ach xajanab'il vuuj, lajan ach icha nok' paramuch sk'ub'ej sb'ha t'a sattac q'ueen. Ch'ox a sat wila'', lolonanh jab'oc vab'i, yujto te wach'tzin a loloni, te wach'pax ilji.
Pechec nok' vaax yet' nok' yune', to syixtej te' cuva nok', icha te' vanto yak'an xumaquil, xchi vinh. Syalan ix cob'es:
Yic in vinh xajanab'il vuuj, wik pax vinh, stanhvi calnel vinh t'a skal anh xumac.

Yacb'an manta ik' t'a q'uinhib'alil, ayic manto sakb'i, meltzajanhcot t'ayin ach xajanab'il vuuj. Lajan tzutej a b'a icha junok nok' ch'ucul, icha nok' quelem ch'ucul toxonhej sq'ue chennaj scot t'a tzalquixtac, xchi ix.
